breathing.text:
bere a worehyɛn mu no
amanne bi a wɔyɛ
sɛ wɔde din bɛmena
mu akɔ
orbital asɔredan
wɔ ahunmu
fam
ahome a wɔhome

nameInput.title: kyerɛw din bi
nameInput.subtitle: ɛbɛforo akɔ Orbital Asɔredan a ɛwɔ ahunmu no mu.

emailInput.title: kyerɛw wo email no
emailInput.subtitle: enti wunya nkra bere a edin no foro kɔ soro no.

success.text:
edin no
{{din}}
mprempren wɔatoto ntonto mu
ama ɔsorokɔ.
bere a na
asɔredan a ɛwɔ ahunmu
aligns, ne
yɛn antena no
wɔ Asase so
yɛbɛsoma
edin no
na wo nsa bɛka
nkrasɛm bi.
